content.new:
For example, `cordless_drill.dae` has:
`565 vertices` and `1126 faces`.

But once loaded into gzserver, it has:
`3378 vertices` and `1126 faces`.

Because once loaded, each vertex and each edge belong to only one face. This means there are several

issue.title: 3D meshes: vertices not shared among faces, resulting in large files
